Name: Ploc
About the game: This is Ploc, brave, agile, fast, and with a super special power, controlling gravity! Walk on the floor, ceiling, or wall and help Ploc get through all the dangers in this frantic and challenging platform puzzle. Ploc has 35 stages and 6 different game modes, they are: Normal: Go through the 35 stages, from the first to the last. Normal Time: The same 35 stages but with a time of 20 seconds to complete each one. Normal Go And Back: Go to the end of each level, press the button, and go back to the beginning. Reverse: Where was the end is now the beginning. Start at stage 35 and go all the way to the first stage, and at each stage you will have to take the opposite path to the one you took in normal mode. Reverse Time: The same stages as in reverse, but with a time of 20 seconds to complete each stage. Reverse Go And Back: In reverse mode, complete each stage by going to the end of it, pressing the button, and returning to the beginning.
